results.description: Major League Baseball and the Houston Astros are investigating claims the team illegally used a camera to steal signs during their 2017 World Series-winning season.
results.title: Houston Astros: MLB and team investigate electronic 'sign stealing' claims

thumbnail.altText: The Houston Astros logo above a banner reading '2017 World Champions'

results.description: President Donald Trump hosted the team at the White House to celebrate their World Series victory.
results.title: Washington Nationals player gets hug from Trump

results.description: US lawmakers donned Washington Nationals merchandise following the team's World Series victory.
results.shortTitle: Nationals World Series win celebrated in Congress
results.title: Nationals' World Series win celebrated in Congress

results.description: Washington Nationals players wear ski goggles and wrap their dressing room in plastic before a champagne-spraying celebration after winning the World Series.
results.shortTitle: Watch how Washington Nationals celebrated World Series win
results.title: Washington Nationals: Players wear ski goggles during champagne celebrations

results.description: The Washington Nationals are crowned World Series champions for the first time after beating the Houston Astros in the decisive seventh game.
results.title: The Washington Nationals win World Series for the first time

results.description: The Washington Nationals force a seventh-game World Series decider by beating the Houston Astros 7-2 in game six to square the series.
results.shortTitle: Nationals take World Series to decider
results.title: The Washington Nationals win game six to take World Series to a decider

results.description: A beer-carrying fan rejects the chance to catch a home run during game four of the World Series between the Houston Astros and the Washington Nationals.
results.shortTitle: Hold my beer! Baseball fan with cans refuses to catch ball
results.title: World Series: Fan holds on to beer and refuses to catch ball during Houston Astros-Washington Nationals game four

thumbnail.altText: Baseball fan refuses to catch ball

results.description: Some spectators chanted "lock him up" as the president appeared on video screens in the stadium.
results.title: Trump booed at Washington DC baseball match

results.description: The Houston Astros are closer to a second World Series title in three years after beating the Washington Nationals 7-1 in game five.
results.shortTitle: Astros one win away from World Series title
results.title: Houston Astros one win away from World Series title

thumbnail.altText: Carlos Correa and Yordan Alvarez of the Houston Astros

results.description: Alex Bregman's grand slam helps the Houston Astros level the best-of-seven World Series at 2-2, after thumping the Washington Nationals 8-1 in game four.
results.shortTitle: Bregman grand slam helps Astros level
results.title: World Series: Houston Astros level with Washington Nationals after Alex Bregman grand slam

results.description: The Washington Nationals are pegged back in the first World Series game in the US capital since 1933, losing 4-1 to the Houston Astros in game three.
results.title: World Series: Houston Astros win in Washington to peg back Nationals

thumbnail.altText: Houston Astros' Robinson Chirinos celebrates his home run

results.description: An executive of the Houston Astros is sacked for "inappropriate" comments made towards female reporters.
results.shortTitle: Taubman sacked over comments to reporters
results.title: Houston Astros sack executive Brandon Taubman over 'inappropriate' comments

results.description: Rob Drake tweeted that there would be another civil war if President Trump was impeached.
results.shortTitle: Baseball umpire probed over 'civil war threat'
results.title: Major League Baseball umpire probed over impeachment 'civil war threat'

thumbnail.altText: Mr Drake in his umpire uniform during a game

results.description: Olympic and World gymnastics champion Simone Biles throws out the first pitch - with a backflip - before the Washington Nationals take a 2-0 lead over the Houston Astros in the World Series.
results.shortTitle: Watch: Biles throws first pitch before Nationals thrash Astros
results.title: World Series: Simone Biles throws first pitch as Washington Nationals thrash Houston Astros to extend lead

results.description: The Washington Nationals take a 2-0 lead in the best-of-seven World Series after thrashing the Houston Astros 12-3 in game two.
results.shortTitle: Nationals thrash Astros in game two
results.title: World Series: Washington Nationals extend lead by thrashing Houston Astros

results.description: Juan Soto hits a massive home run as the Washington Nationals beat the Houston Astros 5-4 in the opening game of the World Series.
results.shortTitle: 'Wow! It's up onto the railroad track' - Soto hits massive home run in World Series
results.title: World Series 2019: Juan Soto shines as Washington Nationals lead Houston Astros 1-0

results.description: The Washington Nationals win their debut World Series game, edging out the Houston Astros 5-4 in game one of the best-of-seven series in Houston.
results.shortTitle: Nationals edge out Astros in game one
results.title: World Series: Washington Nationals edge out Houston Astros in game one

thumbnail.altText: Washington Nationals players Juan Soto (left), Victor Robles (centre) and Adam Eaton (right) celebrate after beating Houston Astros in game one of the World Series

results.description: Major League Baseball's World Series begins on Tuesday - with 'Fall Classic' newcomers the Washington Nationals taking on the Houston Astros.
results.shortTitle: Astros & Nationals set for World Series
results.title: World Series 2019: Houston Astros & Washington Nationals set for Fall Classic

thumbnail.altText: Washington Nationals' Max Scherzer, the World Series trophy and Houston Astros' Gerrit Cole

results.description: The Houston Astros will face the Washington Nationals in the World Series after beating the New York Yankees 6-4 to win the American League Championship.
results.shortTitle: Astros beat Yankees to reach World Series
results.title: Houston Astros reach World Series with win over New York Yankees

thumbnail.altText: Houston Astros celebrate reaching the World Series
